title: (46701) Gandia - 6 Plaça El·líptica
description: Washing machine 12 and 15 kgs and dryer 16 kgs. Everything is clean, paying parking in front for cars and underground parking 20 meters away for cars. Everyone's choice. Underground parking is cheaper.

title: (46701) Gandia - Avinguda de Blasco Ibáñez
description: Free public parking where you can spend the day or night in a quiet way.

title: (46702) Gandia - 70 Avinguda d'Alacant
description: Parking near the town of Gandia. Town just across the bridge, lots of shops, bars, great nightlife. We slept here on a Friday night, didn't mind the music of a car or two. Children's playground nearby, nice park area. We woke up Saturday morning to a market under construction.

title: (46702) Gandia - 88 Parque Pub Sta Anna
description: Attractive flat parking lot for picnic area at foot of hill with start of nice circular hiking path with great views. Very nice park up for dog owners. Edge of town so supermarkets etc not too far. Extremely quiet with very few cars the couple of nights I stayed over a weekend in February. Water fountain and waste bins available.

title: (46702) Gandia - 1 Carrer de Beniarjó
description: Campingaz r907 2.7kg

title: (46702) Gandia - 4B Partida Rajolar
description: Parking in the middle of the polygon and next to a BurgerKing. Quiet zone, we spent two nights during the week with a camper and nobody said anything to us. There is also no signage prohibiting overnight stays. The parking is made of earth and herbs, not very level depending on the area. There is just a nightclub so on the weekend it can be noisy and it seems that people use some area of the parking lot to park and drink before entering the nightclub, so it looks a bit dirty. To park during the day it is a good area.

title: (46702) Gandia - 27 Raval Z.Valor Sector Benipeixc
description: Free parking near the center. Also along the neighboring streets.

title: (46702) Gandia - 55 Avinguda de La Vall d'Albaida
title_short: (46702) Gandia - 55 Avinguda de La Vall d'Albaida
description: The gas station with gas and water.

title: (46702) Gandia - 81 Plaça Numero 14
description: Parking along the road, quiet, safe and well lit, perfect for spending the night.

title: (46728) Gandia - N-332
description: It is a gas station with a lot of space, where you could stay to sleep protected from the very bad if you need it, it has gasoline, cylinder gas, very clean bathrooms, a small grocery store and basic tools and a place to inflate and refill the water free.

name: Camping l'Alqueria
title: (46730) Camping l'Alqueria
description: Doesn’t allow dogs of over 10kg. Lots of permanent stayers. Place looks clean and tidy and pitches look spacious though very expensive

title: (46730) Gandia - 370 Plaça Numero 27
description: Car park to stunning nature reserve. a real gem of a spot near gandia. park is beautiful and green with waterways and big lake

title: (46723) Almoines - 24 Carrer de les Moreres
description: Quiet parking day and night. Drinking water. 100 meters from the trade. 10 minutes walk to the city of Gandia.

title: (46730) Gandia - 4 Calle Pego
description: Street parking. Next to the Camping, Supermarket and low cost petrol station. Seems quiet and safe to spend a night. Near to the Gandia Mediterrânea Ferry’s port.

name: Camping L'Aventura
title: (46710) Camping L'Aventura
description:
Camping Aventura in Daimus near Gandia.
Beach at 600 m and supermarket at 200 m.
Outdoor swimming pool and restaurant bar closed at this time.

title: (46730) Gandia - 2 Carrer dels Lliris Blaus
description: For van or not more than 6 m. Quiet and close to the beach. The 10 places are shared with cars.

title: (46713) Bellreguard - 40 Carrer d'Ausias March
description: Parking next to the park. Very quiet place to spend the night near the city center. Supermarket, gas station, bakeries and places to eat very close.

title: (46730) Gandia - 4 Carretera Sequia del Rei
description: Shared parking with cars but very quiet and shaded. Next to the university. There are cameras and university security. Playground, supermarket, market, beach and information center of the Alqueria del Duc very close.

title: (46710) Daimús - 317 Plaça Poligono 3
description: Parking in front of the sports complex a few meters from the camper area, we were alone at night, in the evening the police passed and made us a simple routine check, and wished us a good night. No services.

title: (46730) Gandia - 2 Calle de Tormos
description: Free parking near the coast of the town and the beach.

name: Area de autocaravanas Dunes
title: (46710) Area de autocaravanas Dunes
description: From Alicante AP7 exit 61 (OLIVA) access the N-332 and look for the CV-670 regional road near the town of Daimús, towards the beach. From Valencia AP7 exit 60 (XERESA), access the N-332 towards Gandia, then look for CV-670 towards Daimús.

title: (46710) Daimús - 4 Arrabal Urb. Rius Norte 1ª Linea
title_short: (46710) Daimús - 4 Arrabal Urb. Rius Norte 1ª Linea
description:
A great secluded tar parking overlooking a green area . Past that is the sea. We are cycling around and noting possible parking areas.

 This one is lovely.

title: (46730) Grau i Platja - 9 Avinguda de la Pau
title_short: (46730) Grau i Platja - 9 Avinguda de la Pau
description:
Ecolavado Lavanderia Autoservicio

Has a number of washers and dryers for low prices.  You might need to dry the clothes on the second setting, costing a little more, if you want them properly dry.

Very convenient parking opposite in the port car park which at least in winter was ok to use even for large motorhomes.

title: (46713) Bellreguard - 12 Ronda dels Esports
description: drinking water point. Good for filling canisters.

title: (46710) Daimús - 51 Avinguda Neptú
description: No overnite. Got moved on by the police at 8.30pm.

title: (46730) Gandía - 62 Ronda de Venecia
description: Esplanade of land to park and sleep that is close to the coast of the town.

title: (46730) Gandia - 3 Avinguda la Platja
description: Land and grass, parking access to the beach, desert in winter. More pleasant than the other end of the beach crowded with motorhome and who settled. Directly on the beach, very quiet. Attention for big jigs look well the road before otherwise the gps make pass in the small streets

title: (46728) Gandia - 13 Urbanització Molló de la Creu N-8
title_short: (46728) Gandia - 13 Urbanització Molló de la Creu N-8
description: Flat and quiet parking in the middle of a small town without much atmosphere. there are no services and there is quite good coverage. we parked here to climb tomorrow in La Marxuquera, from here we are 4 minutes from the sector, we did not like to sleep there.

address.street: 13 Urbanització Molló de la Creu N-8

title: (46710) Daimús - 23 Carrer Potries
description: Municipal water tap.

title: (46710) Daimuz - 1 Polígono 3
description: We have parked next to some buildings I have felt very safe leaving the motorhome there to go to the beach but I don't dare to sleep there because the neighbors can be disturbed.

title: (46710) Daimús - 188 Plaça Poligono 3
description: Parking in a little busy street 100m from the beach and next to a dog park. It has no services, but on the beach promenade there are public toilets and garbage containers.

title: (46710) Daimús - 13-15 Avinguda Alacant
description: Stayed out of season and found it nice and quiet right on the beachfront even over the weekend. good shops close by in Gandia. Used the car park in May for the beach and slept a couple of nights . very peaceful. lots of stray cats .

title: (46730) Grau i Platja - 34 Passeig Marítim de Neptú
title_short: (46730) Grau i Platja - 34 Passeig Marítim de Neptú
description: Laundry service h24. Time 1h and the stuff is ready. Free nearby parking

name: La Naranja campsite
title: (46730) La Naranja campsite
description: La Naranja campsite is ideal for spending a few days on the beach in Gandia. We offer spacious plots in the middle of nature. The campsite has drainage services and is 800 meters from the coastline. We have showers, WC, pool and bar (seasonal). La Naranja campsite is ideal for spending a few days on the beach in Gandia. We offer spacious plots in the middle of nature. The campsite has drainage services and is 800 meters from the coastline. We have showers, WC, pool and bar (seasonal).

title: (46730) Grau i Platja - 11 Carrer de Legazpi
title_short: (46730) Grau i Platja - 11 Carrer de Legazpi
description: A large parking for vehicles on which there is plenty of space to park a camper. Friday and Saturday night there are many people who come to spend the evening so these days I do not recommend it; during the months of July and August, this car park is overcrowded.

name: Km Zero Camper Park
title: (46715) Km Zero Camper Park
description:
It is OPEN 
Opening since July 2013. 
In the region of La Safor, 4km from the beach of Gandia and Oliva. Bike lane that connects Gandía and Oliva. Within a radius of 200m bars, pharmacy, veterinarian, bakery, supermarket.
Includes loading and unloading of tanks, WC, hot water in showers, sinks, sinks and WiFi. Washing machine service (10kg). Dryer, electricity.

title: (46716) Rafelcofer - 88 Carrer Xiquet
description: Parking with night light in one place and another dark. With surveillance cameras, garbage container nearby, you can be comfortable with dogs, and it has a path that leads to the two mountains where you can go both on foot or by bike!

name: Camping La escalada Gandía
title: (46728) Camping La escalada Gandía
description: Mountain campsite with more than 80 large spaces for caravans and motorhomes. Located in the Sierra de Marxuquera (Gandia) which is a favorite area for climbers from all over the world. We have a hilarious that are lovers of this activity.

title: (46722) Beniarjó - 1A Calle Este Ronda
description: A large parking lot behind the sports facilities. Straight and even. You can sleep well and safely!

title: (46713) Miramar - 24 Carrer de la Vall d'Albaida
title_short: (46713) Miramar - 24 Carrer de la Vall d'Albaida
description: Parking 200 meters from the beach. There are a lot of places to park around here.

title: (46715) L'Alqueria de la Comtessa - 21 Arrabal Polig. Ind. Sectores 3 y 4
title_short: (46715) L'Alqueria de la Comtessa - 21 Arrabal Polig. Ind. Sectores 3 y 4
description: A2oil peteol station - self service payment during siesta. Car wash possibilities - for vans or smaller campers (less than 3 m).

title: (46713) Bellreguard - 10 Passeig Mediterrani
description: Water fountain with strong flow to collect water

name: Camping Coelius
title: (46711) Camping Coelius
description: Camping Coelius.

title: (46730) Grau i Platja - 10 Avinguda del Nord
title_short: (46730) Grau i Platja - 10 Avinguda del Nord
description: Quiet area to park, with shops, park, summer cinema, and 150 m from the beach

title: (46730) Gandia - 11 Carrer Ribera Baixa
description: Public parking near a natural beach, if it is not high season you can park at the end of the street, next to the beach. Beach showers and footbaths. Bars and bakeries at 300 mts.Zone of windsurfing, kite surfing and paddle surfing when going out to the beach

title: (46712) Piles - 13 Avinguda de la Torre de Piles
title_short: (46712) Piles - 13 Avinguda de la Torre de Piles
description: A quiet parking lot, next to the Torre de Piles park. Near the beach.

address.street: 13 Avinguda de la Torre de Piles

title: (46721) Potríes - 3 Partida la Campina
description: Large parking area in front of the town's sports center. It has picnic tables in the shade. It is a quiet place to sleep but it is in front of a restaurant that celebrates weddings so on weekends there will be a ruckus. The road passes nearby but at night hardly any cars pass by and you can't hear it. The town has a signposted route to learn about the old hydraulic tradition, in addition to a small museum and with a short walk (10 min) you reach the river, known as Playa de Potries, very beautiful and recommended. To spend a night and visit the place is very good

title: (46712) Piles - 22 Carrer 2 de Maig
description:
The street is long, it leads to the beach. There are parking lots of several sizes. The bigger ones are further away.
Quiet place with a few passing cars.
There are no signs prohibiting motorhomes from parking

title: (46728) Gandia - 6 Carrer Cami Vell de Pinet
title_short: (46728) Gandia - 6 Carrer Cami Vell de Pinet
description: Removing the 15 days of Easter you can find a perfect place, a quiet and safe place

title: (46712) Piles - 25 Carrer Muntanyar
description: Public parking without any marking for motorhomes. But seems to be accepted at least in low season like November. Some motorhomes stand there for weeks or months and not just the first year but like the 5th winter. Not much traffic on this road. Maybe 3 cars per hour on daytime in low season.

title: (46730) Gandia - 768 Plaça Numero 6
description: Parking at the edge of the beach, shower at 50 meters. No other service but this car park is much better than the one just above!

title: (46712) Piles - 7 Carrer Beneteixir
description: Just a wide dead end street. Parking is not marked but possible. Nobody besides of the technicians of the pump (small building at the end on the left) need this street. Police is driving regularly by and don't care. Silent besides of barking dogs even in the night.

title: (46712) Piles - 4 Carrer Beneteixir
description: Public parking along the street. Not marked for motorhomes but seems to be accepted. Some motorhomes stand for weeks or months over there. The road is at least at low season like November rarely used, maybe 5 cars per hour on daytime.

title: (46717) La Font d'en Carròs - 456 Partida la Plana
title_short: (46717) La Font d'en Carròs - 456 Partida la Plana
description: Park of the flat, many tables and benches for picnics, it has cement barbecues type house for greater security, sinks, shade, games for children. Highly recommended for a picnic.

title: (46780) Oliva - 4 Calle Joan Roig de Corella
title_short: (46780) Oliva - 4 Calle Joan Roig de Corella
description: Official car park near the market hall. Good for a day visit.

title: (46770) Xeraco - 8 Carrer Riu
description: Right on the beach. Very good location for swimming and sunbathing. Very quiet day and night. Good for 1-2 nights.

title: (46770) Xeraco - 73 Carrer Ronda de Bruguières
description: Washers and dryers new facilities

title: (46725) - 2 Lugar Planes
description: The town of Rótova is beautiful and you also have several mountain bike and road routes that start and go through here. It has several bars where you can eat very well. There are also excursions such as going up to the Font dels llibreis or the Alt de les Àguiles.

title: (46770) Xeraco - s/n Carrer Ronda de Bruguières
title_short: (46770) Xeraco - s/n Carrer Ronda de Bruguières
description: Street parking both sides used by a few HGV overnighting. I stayed here 2 nights (November) without a problem and it was very quiet during the nights. There may be toilets to use in the sports centre. Supermarket a short walk away.

title: (46790) Xeresa - Unnamed Road
description: Halfway up the top of the Monduver. A perfect place to leave the car and make a route to the top. The "road" to get here is pretty bad, I don't know if all the vehicles can get there without problems. The views are very pretty. Gandia, Cullera and Denia can be seen if the weather is good and clear. An unconventional place, but recommended to enjoy the views.

title: (46780) Oliva - 1 Calle de la Pebrella
description: Lidl parking It is indicated for motorhomes, but there is no service other than an esplanade and the services of the supermarket. For that better to park on the avenue, which had a place closer to the old town

name: Camping Kikopark
title: (46780) Camping Kikopark
description: Kiko Park campsite with a fairly expensive but very good motorhome service area with swimming pool, Spa and above all the sea along the campsite. Superb beach where you can walk very far, ideal for children.

title: (46770) Xeraco - carrer migjorn
description: Absolutely to recommend the Xeraco Campers motorhome area has everything to seduce: the warm welcome of the owners, flat and gravelled pitches delimited by green hedges and palm trees. On-site water and electricity. New sanitary facilities maintained with showers and sinks. Washing machines, 1 dryer, ironing board, washing tubs, dish sinks... A small grocery store, a dining room and a bar. Dishes to eat in or take away. Wifi up to your location. Sliding scale rates according to the seasons and the duration but affordable. Thousand Bravos attention from 10 amps, pitches have increased to 6 amps

title: (46770) Xeraco - 1A Avinguda Arnau Bosquets
description: Faucet, drinking water

title: (46770) Xeraco - 6 Calle Rondonera
description:
Behind BP fuel station is parking for trucks and cars. Warning signs, that you stay at your own risk (staff said to be careful of theafs, lock the car for sleeping), however all night was smooth, we slept well and the area doesn't look that dangerous. We also weren't the only ones to sleep overnight,few tracks and lorries, motorhome and over car-van. All is free, toilets open from outside whole night, picnic area to eat, drinking water, only no showers!
By morning it gets busy as it's on motorway, but till 8am quiet night.

title: (46780) Oliva - 8 Carrer d'Alfons el Magnànim
description: Normal traffic parking. It depends on what season you will have a place, narrow streets to get there.

title: (46770) Xeraco - Km. 570 dcho
description: A water tap after the gas station for trucks

title: (46780) Oliva - 7 Carrer D'Albert Einstein
description: Gas station low cost specialized in trucks with free water.

title: (46728) Barx - CV-675
description: Nice place to take a picnic and to walk a bit.

title: (46720) Vilallonga - 29 Avinguda Antic Regne de Valencia
title_short: (46720) Vilallonga - 29 Avinguda Antic Regne de Valencia
description: Perfect for overnight, quiet place with many parking lots. No noise, near a sports center, near a river route, and the town.

title: (46720) Vilallonga - 349 Partida Tancaes
description: Sation service. Water, air, cleaning and store.

name: Camping San Vicente
title: (46770) Camping San Vicente
description: Camping San Vicente is the ideal place for small and medium campers. We are a small family-run camping site located by the beach with stunning sea views and surrounded by a large fine and sandy beach. Our installation is equipped with modern sanitary blocks and all this at a very economical price during the low/medium season.

title: (46720) Vilallonga - 2 Carrer Bruxerques
description: Self-service laundry opening hours from 8:30 a.m. to 9:30 p.m. Price 5 euros 12 kilos or 7 euros 18 kilos. Dryer price 5 euros 15 kilos.

title: (46758) Barx - 8A Carrer Corral Solat
description: Private land in rural area. Total view in the middle of nature, mountains, pines, etc. Incredible views, with a lot of tranquility and peace, where you can bring your pets. Very popular area for cycling both road and mountain biking and hiking or trail with a variety of outdoor activities. There is a town 2 km away with all kinds of needs. At the moment we do not have a water and electricity point, as well as a gray water drain, but we are working on it. Contact by WhatsApp and payment by Bizum if it can be. The plot is completely flat and has plenty of pine trees.

title: (46720) Vilallonga - 9 Calle Madre María Ràfols
description: Public parking without any service next to a playground. Lighted at night. Hard stand for car size and gravel area for bigger vehicles. Small city with at least 1 Mercadona supermarket and a market on Friday (vegetables, fruits, meat, cheese, fish, shoes, clothes, toys).

title: (46720) Vilallonga - 25 Carrer Santa Teresa
description: Parking for public use.

title: (46758) Barx - 20 Carrer de l'Assagador
description: Quiet and shaded fountain square. Departure of walks. Don't miss eating a paella at the Parpallo restaurant (3rd best paella in Spain).

title: (46780) Oliva - 7 Cl Pescadors dels
description: Free public parking and super quiet. near the sea. without noise!

title: (46720) Vilallonga - 4 Carrer Cais
description: Parking for public use, located in the center of the town. City Hall, bars, public fountains and monuments a few meters away.

title: (46780) Oliva - 9 Carrer Nàpols
description: Easy access quiet mixed gravel car park for a large 8 meter camper without service 100 meters from the beach Some trees for shade

title: (46780) Oliva - 11a Carrer Senyoriu del Rebollet
description:
Parking lot. nothing special. stoney/gravel base. There is another parking spot parallel but this one is easier to get in and out. 
We stayed one night. no problems. 
no services. ok phone signal. 
10/15min walk to shops and beach. would return.

title: (03786) Adsubia - 7 Calle Sector Uno
description: Forna. entry of the population

title: (46720) Villalonga - Partida Tarraso, 346
description:
I can offer a great pitch for one van (maximum length 6m) on my private property.
The pitch is at the top of my quiet and secluded garden. It has an amazing view of La Safor mountain range, and down the valley towards the town of Villalonga.

I live at the end of the valley, surrounded by orange groves, avocado trees and passion fruits. 
Plenty of opportunities for cycling, hiking, river swimming, climbing. Beaches are approximately 20 minutes drive away and are the best in Spain!
Nearby Villalonga is an ordinary working town, not touristy. Facilities include a large supermarket, banks, post office, shops, garage, bars and restaurants.

The pitch is accessed via a private road, it is narrow and steep, 3.5m wide at its narrowest and 4.3m maximum width. 
There is no opportunity to deposit rubbish, there are bins down the valley. Also no facilities for disposing of either grey or black water. 
The pitch is not completely level, but with levellers it is just fine. 
There is electricity and access to clean drinking water at the site.

Cash payments only please. 
Please phone/WhatsApp me in advance or email for more information.
I look forward to meeting you.
Best wishes 
Lynne Morton

title: (46758) Bárig - 12 Polígono 08
description: Ample parking in the cemetery. Some friendly locals visit the cemetery. The other place in town was too humid for us.

title: (46780) Oliva - 200 Urbanització Aigües Blanques S-18 S
title_short: (46780) Oliva - 200 Urbanització Aigües Blanques S-18 S
description: Area to park and spend the night very quiet. Very little space for the van, but enough. In the same dunes. Great beach and magnificent views.

title: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 119 Polígon Marenys Sector 2-A
title_short: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 119 Polígon Marenys Sector 2-A
description: Not very narrow, very quiet location, away from the village and 50 meters from the beach

title: (46758) Barx - 37 Partida Nevera
description: A nice quiet place with picnic benches and water.

name: Camping Azul
title: (46780) Camping Azul
description: Camping Azul. Nice friendly place right on the beach. Plots bordered by trees and shrubs. Small supermarket and restaurant. The driveway leads over narrow streets.

name: Eurocamping
title: (46780) Eurocamping
description: Eurocamping. Wonderful and very economical camping. There is a double row directly on the dunes with sea views. The remaining pitches are generously parceled out. Attention: many trees on the pitches. Be sure to check out the lot first. Restaurant on the dune offers cheap menus.

title: (46780) Oliva - 101 Partida Aigues Blanques
description: Just before the Eurocamping entrance there is a drain and water tap that belongs to the campsite. Attention: you can ask at the campsite, otherwise you will be sent away

title: (46780) Oliva - 89A Urbanització Sant Pere
description: End of a dead end, very quiet, relaxed place to stand for 1-2 mobile homes / vans no services but ideal for one night

title: (46726) Llocnou de Sant Jeroni -
description: The place is perfect to spend the night, very quiet, there a lot of shade

title: (46780) Oliva - 4 Partida Revolteta
description: Repsol fuel station just off the main road. Autogas available here.

title: (46720) Vilallonga - 42 Partida Llacuna
description: Area surrounded by nature, in the urbanization la llacuna. Quiet place without cover. Picnic tables. Large fountain. The barbecues are no longer usable.

title: (46780) Oliva - 28 Avinguda Dalí
description: We parked two days and one night for a cycling test without problems, quiet area and the police passed by and they didn't say anything, everything was perfect, just parking without services and without camping.

title: (46758) Barx - 205 Plaça Poligono 10
description: Picnic areas covered with a roof. There are paelleros in which you can barbecue according to the level of pre-emergency fire (there is a panel which provides information). There is a small raft ideal for cooling off a bit. There is garbage in the recreational area, although I recommend using the containers on the road.

title: (46780) Oliva - 31 Urbanització Sant Pere
description: Free parking. This is the Font Salá spring car park, where hot water comes out all year round. You can swim and it's free. There is no water supply or drainage service, but there is a bar and restaurant.

title: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 7 Passeig de Comunitat D Regants
title_short: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 7 Passeig de Comunitat D Regants
description: Empty industrial area .. good for one night .. station by the way perfect for a trip to Valencia.

name: Camping Tavernes De La Valldigna
title: (46760) Camping Tavernes De La Valldigna
description: Direct access to the beach. Reception and availability of the manager underlined. 2 sanitary blocks maintained. Free WiFi at reception. Bread to order. Ideal if you do it at the beach. Means of transport necessary if you want to walk, 3 km Location Taverne. SNCF station at 1.5 km, ideal for visiting Valence (train every half hour which takes you in 45'

title: (46750) Simat de Valldigna - CV-675
description: Place with wonderful views to spend the night

title: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 1195 Plaça Poligono 15
title_short: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 1195 Plaça Poligono 15
description: Public parking, 200m from the beach. Quiet place to spend the night. Attached to the Motorhome Area Finca. There are no showers on the beach but if you wash. There is no shadow Close to bars and supermarkets.

title: (46780) Oliva - 41 Av Oliva Nova
description: Great parking space on a dead end. Beach within walking distance.

title: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 17A Career la Torre
title_short: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 17A Career la Torre
description: Good for parking and resting ... Suitable for meals. Area for the barbecue. Zone of tables with benches. Lots of trees. Quiet for the night. Leave the area clean.

title: (03789) Oliva - 1 Partida Girateig
description: In the middle of the nature reserve. The many birds are a little annoying. Otherwise great place.

name: Camping La Falaguera
title: (46758) Camping La Falaguera
description: Camping, super quiet, in the mountains and near the beach of Gandia, a municipality declared of speological interest,

title: (46780) - 25 Partida Manegues
description: It is located in the middle of the reed field. I stayed here for 2 nights and found it very relaxed. despite the road noise this is a great place to retreat to. Hardly anyone comes by. really recommended!

title: (03779) Molinell -
description: We stood here in the off-season for a nice quiet night at the edge of the rice fields. Highway noise can be heard, but the birds easily make up for it. Very quiet apart from a few anglers and dog walkers, the warm spring with the restaurant was too much trouble for us, but it's only about a 20-minute walk

title: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 8A Camí del Mar
title_short: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 8A Camí del Mar
description: Free parking. It is quite good, to spend the day on the beaches of the town or spend the night. We have spent the night and without problem. Some noise in the morning from the nearby road but the night was super quiet. There is a fairly large supermarket nearby.

title: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - CV-603
description: Good place to picnic

title: (46750) Simat de la Valldigna - 12 Carrer dels Brolls
title_short: (46750) Simat de la Valldigna - 12 Carrer dels Brolls
description:
Simat motorhome area. A gravel and earth parking lot. Problems if it rains not the best.
Services at the end of the street.
Otherwise good for visiting the magnificent monastery of Santa María de la Valldigna, and spending the night there. Gandia about 20 km. Just A few kilometers. Leaving Tabernes beach. With mountain trails near the city.
self-service laundry 8 a.m. to 9 p.m.

Vending machines 365 days and 24 hours a day. nearby

name: CAMPING OLÉ
title: (46780) CAMPING OLÉ
description: Camping Ola ... Very nice location by the beach. Locations well defined. Some locations by the sea.

name: Camping Pepe · Platja d´Oliva
title: (46780) Camping Pepe · Platja d´Oliva
description: Camping Pepe, on the front line, well-defined shady parcels, good restaurant right to the sea.

title: (46838) Pinet - 6 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Parking on public road adjacent to municipal sports facilities on the outskirts of the village of Pinet. No through traffic Public fountain Picnic area with tables and benches. Public barbeque area. Children's play area. Public swimming pool with outdoor showers in summer (registration required). Small shop and bar in village.

title: (46780) Oliva - 153 Polígon Oliva Nova 4
description: Quiet place to sleep or spend the day two minutes from the beach on foot, only showers for the feet, the place is quite dirty

title: (46750) Simat de la Valldigna - 10 Avinguda Font Menor
title_short: (46750) Simat de la Valldigna - 10 Avinguda Font Menor
description: Self-service laundry with washers, dryers and 24-hour vending.

title: (46760) - 67 Partida Raco de Joana
description: Quiet area with views of the mountains and the sea. Stone tables and benches with good shade. Water source. No WC

title: (46760) Tabernes de la Valldigna - 238 N-332
description: Repsol gas station with toilets and shower with hot water .

title: (46842) Terrateig - 261 Plaça Numero 1
description: Pretty picnic area near a hermitage and the CV 60. Pleasant stopover with picnic tables.

title: (46838) Benicolet - CV-610
description: Very quiet recreational area. It has paelleros and a traditional washing machine as well as a source of non-potable water.

title: (03780) Pego - 15 Avinguda Joan Carles I, Rei
title_short: (03780) Pego - 15 Avinguda Joan Carles I, Rei
description: Self-service laundry with washers and dryers. It also has a coffee machine and snacks. Hours from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m.

title: (03780) Pego - 16 Passeig el Clot
description: Public fountain, the tourist office told me that I could fill out the CC. And additional info next year there will be a reception area ....

title: (03780) Pego - Passeig el Clot
description: New car park for max. 48 hours with 7 designated mobile home parking spaces in the middle of the residential area. Each pitch is 8m long so parallel parking can be a challenge! Electricity is available with 4 Schuko sockets. With multiple sockets, more than just 4 mobile homes can be supplied with electricity. Fresh water tokens are available from the tourist office 50 meters away, opposite the roundabout. Note: Tourist Office open Mon-Sat from 9am to 2pm. *Also open on Fridays from 4:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m.

title: (03780) Pego - 38 Carrer Moreral
description: + Qnet. Quick laundry in the heart of the town. Take the opportunity to visit the town while you wash or dry your clothes

name: Camping Rio-Mar
title: (46780) Camping Rio-Mar
description: Oliva, 116 Urbanització Bassetes. Overnight parking. Rio-Mar campsite.

title: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 5 Carrer Penya de Migdia
title_short: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 5 Carrer Penya de Migdia
description: Obvious water point. You can park right in front

title: (46400) Cullera - 42-60 Entrada de Catali
description: Not for motorhomes, 6meter max. dont go here if you are longer. Small quiet place to sleep. there is access to a beach to walk dogs (El Brosquil) 50 meters and a normal beach right next door. It is close to restaurants and other services.

title: (46409) - 127 Plaça Numero 31
description:
Es un sitio amplio de zona verde,completamente plano,hay ducha,cocina,lavadora y fregadero.
Zona sin ruidos,tranquila y con atardeceres preciosas.
Hay vista desde la terraza a playa y montaña.
Elisabet 625454527

title: (46409) Cullera - 326 Plaça Numero 31 Brosquil
description: Quiet parking lot, miles of beach, only separated by a dune. At the weekend it is very busy with local campers and day tourists. But don't throw your household garbage into the one bin at the site or the one on the beach. They are emptied by the community both on Mondays and so the locals find already filled bins at the weekend and simply put their rubbish on the ground. The garbage is then spread over the square because dogs and rats tear open the bags. 3 large containers are 500 meters away at the entrance / exit. Oh yes, you have to like dogs. There are a lot of dogs running around, including local ones. A drinking water fountain is 2 km away. A semi-large SPAR supermarket is 3.5 km away. LIDL 9 km. It is worth looking at the castle in Cullera, there is a nice inexpensive cafe with lots of tame cats and a half-hour pilgrimage to marvel at. The no-dogs sign from April to September doesn't seem to stop the locals from walking on the beach. ;-) One more thing :, dear campers without a toilet, please take a shovel with you and don't leave the paper lying around, otherwise it will fly over the square and unfortunately all the areas on the right and left of the square where a bush provides cover are full with you human excrement.

title: (46400) Cullera -
description: Please let us know before your arrival! Good morning, we are a camper couple who want to contribute our grain of sand. We are aware of the problem for staying overnight, so we put at your disposal our fenced plot of land on the Cullera beach (Valencia). We do not charge anything, but we would like you to let us know before you arrive, you can bring your pet and enjoy it too! We only ask that you be as comfortable as possible, respect the environment, nature, animals and if you want organic vegetables we will gladly prepare an assortment of the best! Only autonomous vehicles with toilets, this is not a campsite and we do not have a public toilet, you cannot go to the surrounding fields for necessities, it is important to respect the neighbors and the environment, we live surrounded by aquifers that could be affected by droppings or urination... thanks in advance! If we all respect the environment, this place will always be available, otherwise we will not be able to continue with this adventure. Thank you for your understanding, greetings?

title: (03860) Lorcha - Les Fontetes
description: Very quiet area with place for two campers. Good views of the river.

title: (46759) Simat de la Valldigna - 2A Barri Pla de Corrals
title_short: (46759) Simat de la Valldigna - 2A Barri Pla de Corrals
description: Very large and flat gravel parking area. We enjoyed a very peaceful night here. Beautiful mountain views. One minute walk to local village with a lovely little tapas bar. Rubbish bins, water and large BBQ area.

title: (46409) Cullera - 97 Entrada de Catali
description: Spot discovered at the edge of the beach. At the edge of the beach, away and with no one around. Not very clean but not bothersome.

title: (03787) Beniaia - 1A Carrer Carretera
description: Free parking at the entrance of the town of Beniali. The parking lot is quite flat and quiet, the spaces are for medium-sized camper vans. It has containers. Perfect for the route of the Foradà and the route of the 8 villages.

title: (03789) Dénia - 95B Partida Deveses
description: Dead end street at the entrance of the beach of Dénia. Quiet in front of residence and houses. Very quickly filled the day with people going to the beach, no one at night. Shower feet on the beach

title: (03789) La Vall d'Ebo -
description: Beautiful, almost level gravel space for a maximum of two van class vehicles. No prohibition signs. Getting there is still a relatively good route, albeit very uneven and with one or two potholes. Four-wheel drive not required. In summer the site offers very little shade. At the square, the road goes to a picnic area (see photo). There are also two parking options. However, from this place (which is described here) there is a chain, and it is therefore not possible to drive through to the picnic area permanently. When we were there the chain was open and two cars at the picnic area. Attention: high risk of forest fires in summer. In August 2022, 12,000 ha burned there. The place is very quiet with a magnificent view and a starry sky.

title: (03788) Alicante - 78 Partida la Carroja
description: Place of land with trees between the pool and the indoor soccer field. Vall views

name: CAMPING EN DÉNIA - LOS PATOS
title: (03789) CAMPING EN DÉNIA - LOS PATOS
description: Camping Los patos economical and a little anarchic. Accepted animals. Beach at 50m. Restaurant. Motorhome service

title: (03860) L'Orxa - 30 Carrer del Castell
description: There is one site located in L'orxa (Lorcha) on P4N. I prefer to stay where someone else might be usually, so went in search of another location. I came to L'orxa as it has a BTT cycle route centre and plenty of nearby routes for cycling, mountain biking and hiking here, sign posted, printed and online using apps like Wikiloc and Backcountry Navigator. I visited L'Auberge Del Serpis to enquire about routes and had a beer there. Nice guys catering for people stopping over on cycle routes. You can top up water there if you ask nicely and a shower with a towel. Parking is flat, but it is in a dried up river bed used as passage for a few cars, so if its dry, it's good. There are a few bars in the village and they also serve some local dishes. If you want to go cycling or walking, then I suspect you will like it here.

title: (03787) Patró - 2 Calle Carretera
description: Alpatró Along a wide street outside town, on one side there are cherry trees. Only 2/3 sites, nice, quiet and safe place. No services. Ideal for visiting the Vall de Gallinera and going on an excursion to the 8 villages. Car pass first thing in the morning.

title: (46409) Cullera - 14 Avinguda de l'Estany
description: Quiet sandy place for max. 4 vehicles. Right on the beach at the end of a cul-de-sac. No prohibition signs and no service. Mobile is good.

title: (03788) Patro - 2 Calle Joan Fuster-alpatro
description: New motorhome area with all services. Beautiful town, with a bar and spectacular views. Well-known and very beautiful family routes. Highly recommended the route of the eight towns

name: Camping Los Llanos
title: (03779) Camping Los Llanos
description: Larger than 7 m with tanks No chance for disposal. Delicious BB Grill Restaurant within walking distance at Lidl. Environment around the campsite very littered. Campsite itself is clean and in order!

title: (03860) L'Orxa - 3 Partida Devesa
description:
New parking area next to the old paper mill (chulisima, although now in ruins) and under the Perputxent Castle. There are parts that are level and others more inclined, although there is a level place around the buildings and at the foot of the chimney.
Without Services.
It sleeps in luxury and with good views.
Excellent overnight site for the BTT route of the greenway of the Serpis river.
Bikes can be hired at the hostel.

title: (03789) Dénia - 9 Avenida Monte Pego-Dénia
description: Rest area

title: (03787) Patro - CV-700
description: Fountain next to the road. There is a small parking lot. Water can be loaded for a need.

title: (03860) L'Orxa -
description: We have spent the night here and it is a sea of tranquility, it is next to the old train station that is in ruins and the Via Verde del Serpis route also begins here, there is no water or toilet but if you can take a dip later on the Weir of Hell.

title: (03789) Dénia - 9-7 Avenida Monte Pego-Dénia
description: Gravel parking lot behind bankrupt garden center. nearby road is noisy in the morning but we did not hear it in the night with earplugs. ok for one night if you cannot find anything else.

title: (46409) Cullera - 20 Avinguda de l'Estany
description: Public parking in open space next to the beach.

title: (03789) La Vall d'Ebo - 126 Lugar Diseminados
description: Ebo valley laundry. quiet area next to the track, with drinking water and flat pk area

name: Camping Natura
title: (46842) Camping Natura
description: Camping Natura - Rugat family camping. Close to various hiking spots.

title: (46842) Rugat - 14 Carrer Jaume I
description: A very nice quiet place to stay. Access only suitable for van. Barbecue area and children's playground.

title: (03779) Dénia - 16 Carrer Riu Deva
description: Quiet place to sleep, very close to low-rise housing, you have to be respectful of noise and clean. You wake up with the water in front of you. In high season it is difficult to find a place here. Enter 3 Ac / Campers.

title: (03789) - 67D Partida Deveses B
description: A very charming place, esplanade for about 10 cars. get up with a view of the sea. very calm.

title: (03789) Vall d'Ebo - 26 Urbanizacion Pla de la Corona
title_short: (03789) Vall d'Ebo - 26 Urbanizacion Pla de la Corona
description: Quiet place two minutes from the population of La Vall d'Ebo. At the end of a road where apparently they were going to urbanize and the road was left alone, completely flat. Great views, very close to hiking, canyoning ... A short distance away is the beautiful Barranc de l'infern or the 6,000 steps route (the cathedral of hiking)

title: (46842) Rugat - 54 Plaça Gral Diseminados
description:
Picnic area in the middle of nature.
There is no drinking water, but you sleep very peacefully.
10 minutes away there is a raft to bathe.

title: (03779) Dénia - 2 Carrer Riu Cérvol
description: Impasse which arrives on the beach, sea view.

title: (03770) Vergel - 58 Avenida Valencia
description: Laundry, with a large area to park motorhomes.

title: (03788) - 37 Lugar Diseminados
description: The Font de la Mata de Benisilim. Point where the Route of the 8 Villages ends (you can do it the other way around, of course). Picnic area, two wooden tables with benches. There is an old fountain, but it looks like it hasn't worked for years. There is a garbage can. Very secluded and quiet place. Good shade for the summer.

title: (46614) Favareta - 2 Carrer Corbera
description: Short of the AP7 a surprising park where you can stretch your legs and have lunch on a bench

title: (03769) Ráfol de Almunia - 6 Plaza San Francisco de Paula
title_short: (03769) Ráfol de Almunia - 6 Plaza San Francisco de Paula
description: Parking next to the pavilion. Quiet area, without services. There is no sign prohibiting mobilehomes parking. Entrance through a street where there is a dead-end street sign that goes to the paddle tennis courts. Behind the slopes is the parking lot.

title: (46840) - 440 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Recreational area about 2km. from the village with barbecue and tables. At the top there is a parking space for small vans, but below there is a large terrace to park. Nice views of Benicadell and the Bellús reservoir

title: (03770) Vergel - 53 Avenida Valencia
description: Fuel station with autogas supply

title: (03795) Sagra - Camino les Hortes, 3
description: Carpark at entrance to village, backed by orange trees. On grass. Good base for mountain hike. Small village has basic commerce and 2 cafes. Stayed 2 nights. Very peaceful.

title: (03788) Alcalà de la Jovada - 25 Diseminado Diseminados
title_short: (03788) Alcalà de la Jovada - 25 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Public parking. Fairly level and wide. No services. Recycling containers. Starting point for hiking. Nearby there is a children's play area, swimming pool and restaurants.

title: (46409) Cullera - 14 Carrer l'Escollera
description: Site at the mouth of the Júcar ... the only thing that fills up with fishermen first thing in the morning

title: (03850) Beniarrés - CV-701
description: There is nothing in the right place. Perhaps it refers to the recreational area that is about 200 meters away (already in Park4Night).

title: (46667) Barcheta - 7 Partida la Judía
description: Nice picnic site next to the town sports center, barbecue area and children's park we have spent the day but you could even spend the night

title: (03795) Tormos -
description: Esplanade in the middle of nature, quiet place without any service. We stopped today with the van to eat.

title: (46400) Cullera - 64 Plaça Numero 22
description: Empty land there are some services 100m from the beach. Quiet area at night and day. Large influx of motorhomes. easy access

title: (03760) Vinyals -
description:
Family park with loads of kids activities like zip-wire, slide, climb
Loads of benches around
Public toilets, looks clean but wet floor and no paper
Water point outside behind toilets and inside toilets
Big rubbish bins nearby

Carpark maybe not suitable for overnight as it is sloped

title: (46841) - 71 Plaça Diseminado
description: It is a parking lot of an outdoor playground with a picnic area, benches and a grill. Suitable for Mercedes Sprinter, good access, very quiet

title: (03760) - 158A Partida Vinyals
description: At the foot of the Segaria natural park. with mountain views. Very quiet and with a few routes.

title: (03700) Dénia - 21 Carrer Llac Leman
description: Parking in an alley next to the beach... no sign of not being able to spend the night. Clean place and you have to keep leaving it clean.

title: (46400) Cullera - 4D Urbanización Monte Sant Antoni
description: Legal space to park. Quiet place Many fishermen in the morning

title: (03779) Valencian Community - 2 Partida Gironets, Carrer 26
description: Large free mixed unpaved parking in the city center nearby Trash cans Accessible to any motorhome with trailer

title: (03700) Dénia - 17 Carrer Llac Leman
description: Quiet parking without services on the beach. On asphalt and at the end of a street lit at night. There are more similar car parks in the area, but this one seems better maintained. Very quiet and solitary in low season, even on vacation, but it is surely impossible to park in summer.

title: (46400) Cullera - 244 Plaça Numero 22
description: Car park created for festivals (ZEBRA, MEDUSA, ..., later without use or exploitation. Many spaces. 100 meters from the sea. Next to it is a parking lot operated by the City Council.

title: (03850) - 10 Partida Pontet
description: Picnic area, ideal to spend day and night. we have done the night without problem, several cars and fires.

title: (46400) Cullera - 26 Carrer Benicull
description: Gas station with gas and to refill non-potable water

title: (46400) Cullera - 65 Plaça Numero 23
description: We have stopped for a lunch. Lovely river with plenty boats. Very spacious.

title: (46400) Cullera - 1 CV-605
description: Laundromat, bar, gas station with water, Chinese bazaars and Mercadona supermarket. Market very well.

title: (46400) Cullera - 203 Plaça Numero 22
description: Parking only, no camping. guarded. 14 euros 24 hours. very quiet to sleep.

title: (03779) Setla - 7 Partida Revoltes Cl-03b
description: Small parking lot at the swimming pool els poblets I discovered this when I was looking for calm before the storm on the coast, there are a few houses in the area, the place is lit for the above-mentioned purpose, perfectly fine

title: (03850) - 36 Partida Molino Plans
description: Quiet place off the main road. There is a possibility of parking for up to 3 cars. The driveway is asphalt, but it is quite narrow, so be careful if you have a wide car ? Silent Night.

title: (03700) Dénia - 2 Carrer Llac Sant Martí
description: Many small perpendicular streets without issues that face the beach. This is not a camping area but I think that if van type vehicles are limited to 2, it would be accepted. No building around phew, possibility of finding restaurants

title: (46400) Cullera - 2 Carrer Ribera Baixa
description: We stayed two quiet nights. there is a park with a water fountain. Garbage cans. nearby is the mercadona supermarket and the petrol station. 20 min walk to the center via a small bridge.

title: (46400) Cullera - 69 Avinguda del País Valencià
description: We came to Las Fallas and slept without problems

title: (46400) Cullera - 167 Plaça Numero 22
description: Large car park near town centre very suitable for campervans. Carpark is a gritted surface.

title: (03778) Beniarbeig - 2204 Ensanche de Camino Ano
description: It's a small cemetery parking lot. You can definitely get further with a smaller car. Motorhomes please turn around. The streets get really narrow from here. Very quiet night, no prohibition sign. Concrete parking lot next to an orange grove. Please take your rubbish with you.

title: (46400) Cullera - 229 CV-605
description: Public scale, also for campers.

title: (46400) Cullera - 229A Camí Molí Cremat
description: Drinking water point, provide thief plug because house tap, push button, good flow

title: (46400) Cullera - 1 Carrer Cabanyal
description: In Cullera there is a self-service laundromat with easy parking for motorhomes, but it's new and very clean. We liked it because we went with the bikes that you can have in plain view, but the best thing is that it's in the middle of the beach with bars and shops. We had a beer on the terrace of the restaurant La Cabaña, just 80 meters away. In addition, they have an application in which you can see at any time the remaining time for your laundry. We do not like to wait, so we thought it was great.

title: (46400) Cullera - 9 Carrer dels Llauradors
description: Area of large streets of urbanization without finishing good to park and close to the city center.

title: (46400) Cullera - 91 Carrer del 25 d'Abril
description: Laundromat Open Blue with very good machines, you can pay with coins, bills or credit card, wash 15kg, dry 25mn, machines at the entrance with drinks, opening hours: 8:00 to 22:00

title: (03791) Benimaurell - 2 Partida Olbis
description: Good place to stay, Bin (altough, hardly 1 km in town we can be lost to Road selector bins), tablets, beside to Road bit not main so noises can be avoid.

name: Càmping & Bungalows Vall de Laguar
title: (03791) Càmping & Bungalows Vall de Laguar
description: Very nice and quiet campsite with a view of Campell and the sea. Extremely difficult to approach for large liners. Low-hanging branches, narrow roads and tight curves limit a vehicle length to around 8 m and a vehicle height to around 3.20 m. No disposal option for vehicles with fixed tanks.

title: (46400) Cullera - 9 Plaça Constitució
description: Public toilets really not clean but that's still it! Faucet for washing hands.

title: (46400) Cullera - 4C Urbanización Monte Sant Antoni
description: Cullera viewpoint with parking

title: (03791) Alicante - 2 Partida Collao
description: Carpark of the Venta del Collao restaurant. When we arrived to book for the superb 'menu del dia' we were offered parking overnight so we could a enjoy wine with our meal. Restaurant only open 11am to 5pm, Wed to Sun. Calm at night, walkers arrive at daybreak. Beautiful views. Access OK but single track from Benimaurell.

title: (46400) Cullera - 1B Carrer Madrid
description: Large open-air parking. Free (at least in winter). Central, little light but quiet. No services
